March 15  is World Consumer Rights Day . According to consumer protection laws in China, consumers  have  nine rights, including the right to truthful information, free choice , respect and so on. If you  find  there's any problem with your goods, talk to the seller first, and try  to get  your money back or get an exchange. If you can't reach an agreement, call 12315 or go to your local consumers association for help.
